name: Funfair Billionaire
storyline:
Do you dream of becoming a billionaire by draining rigged carnival machines? Welcome to FUNFAIR BILLIONAIRE, the game where you throw your fake money into shady attractions just for the thrill of watching numbers go up (or not).

A game that reeks of sweat, blurry pixels, and questionable game design. Built with the blood, sweat, and tears of a developer who probably should have stayed an accountant but instead decided to create his "masterpiece"—badly optimized and with a certain disdain for usability.
summary: Funfair Billionaire is the ultimate experience of a carnival as shady as a scratched-off lottery ticket. Rigged machines, sadistic physics, and a fate sealed by an algorithm that despises you—because deep down, you enjoy suffering. One more round? Of course.
